entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
